content.question: Which of the following historical situations was the author responding to?

choices.label: The United States enactment of restrictive immigration policies
The United States efforts to limit the influence of industrialists
The increased involvement of the United States in Asia and the Pacific
The United States response to demands from Progressive reformers

content.answer: The increased involvement of the United States in Asia and the Pacific

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
